title: The Forgotten Edge
description: Two men set out to do a simple planetary survey when tragedy strikes. Trapped on a world that is completely alien, yet somehow eerily familiar will they survive or will they fall over the edge? When their mother ship explodes for an unknown reason, Andrews and Levy are left with nothing but a short range transport and a few simple tools. With no other choice they set out on a mission to survive the alien world they find themselves trapped on.
author: Jamie Dodge
